io.spine.core

Class EventEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.core.AbstractMessageEnvelope<I,T,C>
      • io.spine.core.EnrichableMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.core.Event,io.spine.core.EventContext>
        • io.spine.core.EventEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActorMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.core.Event,io.spine.core.EventContext>, MessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.core.Event,io.spine.core.EventContext>

    public final class EventEnvelope
extends EnrichableMessageEnvelope<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.core.Event,io.spine.core.EventContext>
    The holder of an Event which provides convenient access to its properties.

      • setOriginFields

        public void setOriginFields(io.spine.core.EventContext.Builder builder)
        Sets the origin fields of the event context being built using the data of the enclosed event.

        In particular:

        • the root command identifier replicates the one defined in the enclosed event;
        • the context of the enclosed event is set as the origin.
        Parameters:
        builder - event context builder into which the origin related fields are set

      • getEventContext
